title: 7.2.7 Create scan API endpoints
body:
## Parent Issue
#30 - 7.2 Security Scanner Engine

## Objective
Create REST API endpoints for scan management.

## Endpoints
- POST /api/v1/scans - Start new scan
- GET /api/v1/scans - List scans
- GET /api/v1/scans/:id - Get scan status
- POST /api/v1/scans/:id/cancel - Cancel running scan
- GET /api/v1/scans/:id/findings - Get findings for scan

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/scans.py`

## Estimated Time: 2 hours
